title: [WAITING ON CHECKLIST] [$250] Expense Details - The header of the expense details displays "[amount] for [Description]"
issue_repo_steps:
Action performed: 1. Navigate to https://staging.new.expensify.com/
2. Create a workspace
3. Go to the workspace chat
4. Click the plus button > Submit Expense > enter amount, description, and merchant, and complete the submission
5. Open the expense details

Expected result: The conversation title in the LHN should display "[amount] for [Merchant]"

Actual result: None
